text:
-It also respects the name attribute if present. The infection will not spread from one named piece to another by itself. 
If you dont want that to happen delete the name attribute!
-If 'infection' attribute is present the node will automatically remove starting group option.
-If you check Custom multiplier attribute the node expects an attribute called 'multi'.
-Noise inside is very basic in interest of speed. You can import more complex noises with 'multi' attribute.
